ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // “Please choose a room.
(Gosh, he's so weird…
but then again, they all are.)”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Poo, I uh, mean, Sir…”{PAUSE}“Hurry…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Sir…”{PAUSE}“Choose the BEST 'flavor' from the
4 rooms.”{PAUSE}“But you can only choose
from an unoccupied room.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // “Oh, don't be angry with me…
(Geez…this one's probably
the violent type…)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // “There you are. Enjoy yourself
(You moody creepo!)”

dialogStrings:
“Sir…”{PAUSE}“Choose the BEST 'flavor' from the
4 rooms.”{PAUSE}“But you can only choose
from an unoccupied room.”

“Please choose a room.
(Gosh, he's so weird…
but then again, they all are.)”

{Cloud}
“Looks like this room's being used.”
{CHOICE}Take a listen
{CHOICE}Take a peek

{Cloud}
“Looks like it's unoccupied.”
{CHOICE}I guess I'll take this one
{CHOICE}Hold ground

{Cloud}
“I wonder if they'd change it if I asked?”
{CHOICE}I want this room
{CHOICE}Hold ground

{Cloud}
“I've changed my mind…
…I want to change rooms.”

“All right.
Now all we have to do is
enter the room.”{PAUSE}“You're not going to have
a change of heart, are you?”
{CHOICE}Don't make me repeat myself
{CHOICE}I'm still trying to decide

“Oh, don't be angry with me…
(Geez…this one's probably
the violent type…)”

“There you are. Enjoy yourself
(You moody creepo!)”
